DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Promiseb Topical Cream in cradle cap.
DOC.brief_title: Promiseb Topical Cream for Cradle Cap
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of cradle cap Must be at least 30 days old Must be in good health as determined by investigator Naive to prior cradle cap therapy (may have used mineral, olive oils) Known food, topical product or medicinal allergies. Prior use of corticosteroids, antifungals or keratolytics for Cradle Cap Weighing less than 7 lbs
